data.title: Watch Maya the Bee Online
data.meta_description: Looking to watch Maya the Bee? Find out where to watch Maya the Bee from Season 2 at TV Guide
data.text:
2012-2022

2 Seasons

Knowledge

Fantasy, Kids

TVY

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Children's animated series about a curious young bee who leaves her hive to explore the outside world, where she befriends other insects and goes on adventures.

Episode 14

A Strike in the Hive

Mon, Jul 13, 2020 20 mins

Bees at a distillery strike from overwork. Maya tries employing ants as replacements, albeit with a more complicated result than expected.

Where to Watch

Episode 18

Remind Me to Eat You

Thu, Jul 16, 2020 20 mins

When Maya and Willy accidentally harm Thekla, they help her recover by providing food. During her recovery, Thekla gains insight into why insects evade her.

Where to Watch

Episode 23

Private property

Mon, Jun 21, 2021 20 mins

Maya the Bee has been assigned the crucial duty of maintaining balance in the meadow by preventing the insects from overrunning the flowers. Can she successfully restore harmony to the situation.

Where to Watch

Episode 24

The Killer Buzz

Mon, Jun 21, 2021 20 mins

Maya and Willy are happy when frogs leave the pond, but then mosquitoes show up and cause trouble. The duo must find a solution to deal with the pesky insects.

Where to Watch

Episode 25

The fortune Teller

Mon, Jun 21, 2021 20 mins

Maya is skeptical of Lara's ability to predict the future, while her friends have faith in Lara's predictions. Maya must find a way to maintain her beliefs without alienating her friends.

Where to Watch
